data.title: Integration of RGPx Proto-Proof — Repository Link
data.summary: The RGPx Proto-Proof experiment by Kimi has been integrated under `/experiments/rgpx_proof_proto/` in the Φ-Mesh repository. This entry provides a permanent index reference for the first reproducible evidence of Φ-plateaus in open datasets. --- context: > The experiment serves as the empirical baseline for future Φ-Predictor development and can be accessed directly via the experiments README link.
